text: And up to ten years' imprisonment can be imposed on anyone convicted of sabotage. These stern measures had the desired effect today at Kumasi where the strikers gave in, but in Takoradi, the chief storm centre, are still holding out despite the presence of 1,400 police and 16 armoured cars. And how did the Government react when the strikers demonstrated in Accra?
handwritten_text: Any handwritten text found in the document
name: CYnodo Pzololel
